queryHandle.description: Query handle from wit-get-work-items-by-query-wiql (ensures analysis is based on real query results, not hallucinated IDs)

analysisType.description: Analysis types: effort (Story Points breakdown), velocity (completion trends), assignments (team workload), risks (blockers/stale items), completion (state distribution), priorities (priority breakdown)

title: wit-analyze-by-query-handle
description: üîê HANDLE-BASED ANALYSIS: Analyze work items using a query handle instead of explicit IDs. Prevents ID hallucination in analysis workflows. Provides effort estimates, velocity trends, assignment distribution, risk assessment, completion status, and priority analysis. Forces safe analysis patterns.
